QuestData.Title: Disarming Sha'naar
QuestData.Description: Draenei at the Temple of Sha'naar would mine these mountains for perfect crystals used to channel their magics. Now demons be lootin' the place. We gotta keep those crystals out of demonic hands, commander!$b$bAttack the mines behind the temple and grab them crystals.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $oa Unrefined Draenic Crystals from the mines located within the Temple of Sha'naar in Tanaan Jungle.
